description: Kottage Chandrasena alias Kiri Mama   Vs  The Hon. Attorney General before Hon.Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J.
parties: Kottage Chandrasena alias Kiri Mama   Vs  The Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Reasons for silence of a child victim of sexual abuse. -Delay in making a police complaint. -Particulars to be mentioned in framing charges. -Objections on defective charges to be raised at the inception. -Date of offence in indictment is not a material matter unless it is an essential part of the offence. -Probability of the prosecution case. -Evaluating the evidence of a child witness. -Impact of contradictions and omissions.Credibility of prosecution witnesses
legistation: Section 365 B (2) B of the Penal Code. -Section 165 (1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act. -Section 174 (1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act
